people.name: Adam Szegedi
people.short_bio: Experienced Test Automation Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in the banking industry. Skilled in SQL, Test Automation, Linux. Quality assurance professional with a strong background holding a BsC qualification of Business Information Technologist accredited by Corvinus University.

school.school: Andrássy György Secondary School of Economics
school.title: Basic marketing knowledge

work.responsibility: Regression and load testing for various companies, legacy python application development.
Functional and regression testing for a debt management company. Maintain, develop, and integrate regression and load test tools into the company's environment.
Functional and regression testing for a listing site and all linked services. Maintain, develop, and integrate automated regression testing to a ci system.
Plan, develop and maintain the automated testing for several application maintained by our company.

Plan and coordinate the development of the accounting module. Write technical specification, and investigate user issues. Later on, I coordinated the team responsible for the development and maintenance of the whole accounting module.
